metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7716 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The read_u32_leb128 function in libr/util/uleb128.c in radare2 1.3.0 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-readand application crash) via a crafted Web Assembly file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7716` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-5.0.0 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
libradare2-common - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
radare2 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0+dfsg-2').
